name: Animate vine
text: This counts as a monster with base stats of 8-average, +1 size, +5 combat, a Net attack, and Sessile and Unseeing. It's typically aggressive against anything nearby.

name: Aquatic
text: This thrives in water rather than on land.

name: Armour (n)
text: Take +n to combat, -n to athletics, and -n to stealth.

name: Armour piercing (n)
text: Take +n to combat up to a maximum of the target's total Armour value.

name: Civilian
text: No mechanical effect, but it is assumed that player characters won't have much use for this.

name: Cornucopic
text: This produces a tremendous amount of food. Cornucopics are illegal under Hebai's Law.

name: Crit
text: This inflicts double damage. If multiple effects give crits, the effect adds, eg with two crits, an attack inflicts triple damage.

name: Fight style
text: You may only have one boon with this; that boon only applies if you have no Armour.

name: High-level
text: This spell is only available at high level. Will be deprecated once I develop a spell level system.

name: Incapacitated
text: You can't do anything. Lasts until end of battle.

name: Modifier
text: This ability may be used in conjunction with an action to change its rules. You may stack arbitrarily many modifiers.

name: Move
text: This is an action that otherwise isn't available.

name: Net
text: On a hit against an opponent without Tangled, this inflicts Tangled n instead of n damage.

name: Prereq
text: You can't take this without the listed prerequisite. If you do somehow get it, it doesn't take effect.

name: Sessile
text: This can't manoeuvre around the battlefield. It can still move eg to fight, as opposed to something fully paralysed.

name: Slow
text: This can't be used during Crisis, the idea being that it takes a while and is at least a little fiddly.

name: Social
text: No mechanical effect, but if ever I create a social skill, this will be associated with it.

name: Trap
text: No mechanical effect, but this is often used as a trap.

name: Tribal
text: No mechanical effect, but it probably synergises with other effects with the same tribe.

name: Unseeing
text: This doesn't use vision for perception. It doesn't generally suffer any combat penalties, but can't do things such as read or see colour.

name: World-building
text: This content exists for world-building purposes, but is not available to players.

name: Injured
text: Take -$n to all physical actions. Decrease by 1 with each long rest.

name: Tangled
text: Take -$n to all physical actions. You can't manoeuvre. You have Untangle (move): if engaged this round, you don't inflict damage on a win, and if you win all engagements, resolve this condition. Lasts 3 rounds.
